originalText.text: Carmen Jack Giordano is an amazing attorney. He was very compassionate and caring. He took my case seriously and navigated me to obtain favorable results. His associate, Stefanie was also great to work with. Both of them made sure that they explain in detail and eased my mind about the whole process. Great customer service and professionalism. I highly recommend Giordano Law Offices. Thank you for all your help!

originalText.text: I am so grateful that Carmen "Jack" Giordano is my family's attorney, I'm confident that I'm in really good hands with him and would recommend Giordano Law Offices without hesitation. He has been there for us during the most trying of times. Carmen is extremely knowledgeable, tough, always available, reasonably-priced, and is also such a genuinely caring and friendly guy. Stefanie is too--she has always been so friendly to me and responds to emails almost immediately. The office staff are quick and responsive as well. We hit the jackpot with Giordano Law offices, searching for a lawyer can be daunting but definitely give Giordano Law offices a call, you will not be disappointed!

originalText.text: Carmen is an unusual lawyer. I had a personal legal matter and I found him through a quick and easy google search. He is a good lawyer with a warm and kind heart. He is responsible and has treated me like family as soon as we meet. I am very grateful to know him and work with him. He is very knowledgeable of my difficult situations and understanding. Compared to other lawyers, his prices are reasonable too. If someone needs a consultation by the law, definitely I strongly recommend it to him.

originalText.text:
I've consulted and utilized the legal services of the Giordano law offices on a number of occasions and consider Carmen a friend. He's a consummate professional who always puts his clients best interests first. He is a down to earth logical problem solver as well as a tenacious attorney who knows how to get to the heart of a legal maze.
Unlike a number of other corporate attorneys I've retained in the past, Carmen answers the phone and doesn't punch a clock simultaneously. I feel as though he has treated me as family for the rates he has charged for his legal expertise.
I would highly suggest you give Carmen Giordano a call and end your search for a caring, intelligent, and highly qualified professional attorney.

originalText.text: Attorney Carmen "Jack" Giordano is amazing  He helped me with some legal issues that another attorney couldn't resolve for me.   My results where better than expected.  Honestly, if you want an legal issue solved effectively and with professionalism-- go to the Giordano Law Offices!  Don't waste your time elsewhere.
